text: Zbyszko Piwoński (9 July 1929 – 2 August 2022) was a Polish teacher and politician. He was a member of the Polish United Workers' Party and later the Democratic Left Alliance. He was Voivode of Zielona Góra Voivodeship from 1984 to 1990 and was a Senator from 1993 to 2005. Piwoński was born in Stawiska, Poland. Piwoński died on 2 August 2022 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish educators Category:Polish politicians
title: Zbyszko Piwoński
